Articles.Content:
i keep getting this warning every time i try to launch anything, any help ?

picture

Edited December 31, 2014 by Abdu
You've probably have an incompatible part installed. Try eliminating parts from your ship until you CAN launch to see which part it is.

You've probably have an incompatible part installed. Try eliminating parts from your ship until you CAN launch to see which part it is.

thanks i'll try it right now,

but why does it say "craft is too heavy!" ?

If you're in career and your craft is too heavy for the pad, you'll have to upgrade the launchpad.

This is a gameplay element, if it happens in sandbox you've bugged your craft file.

Edited December 31, 2014 by sal_vager

You're in career and your craft is too heavy for the pad, you'll have to upgrade the launchpad.

This is a gameplay element, not a support issue.

that was in sandbox not career mode :/

Yes, I see that now, most likely the craft file got corrupted somehow, if you back it up and open it you can delete the size info, that can make KSP recalculate the size and mass.

If it's a pre-0.90.0 craft then its info wont be there yet and saving it is supposed to add it in.

I don't think addons cause this, as I've seen this on stock games too.
